# Tyre Inventory Management System

## Project Overview
Full-stack tyre inventory management web application for retail tyre shop operations.

## Tech Stack
- **Frontend**: React.js with modern hooks
- **Backend**: Node.js with Express.js
- **Database**: SQLite (local) with migration path to PostgreSQL/MySQL
- **Styling**: CSS with responsive design

## Project Structure
- `/backend` - Express API server with SQLite database
- `/frontend` - React application for inventory management UI

## Features
- Add, edit, delete tyres from inventory
- Search and filter tyres by brand, size, type
- Track stock levels and pricing
- Responsive web interface
- RESTful API architecture
- Easy migration to remote database (PostgreSQL, MySQL)

## Development Guidelines
- Use modern JavaScript (ES6+)
- Follow REST API best practices
- Implement proper error handling
- Use environment variables for configuration
- Keep code modular and maintainable
